EmailTemplate.name: Add to Register
EmailTemplate.subject: Add to Class Register
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Message from the Admissions Office:
Please Add the following child to the class register: Student's Name: {!Opportunity.Student_Name__c} Student's Surname: {!Opportunity.Name}Starting Date: {!Opportunity.CloseDate}Class:{!Opportunity.Year_Group__c} {!Opportunity.Class__c}
Many thanks,
Admissions Office
